body_html: Any improvement on this is welcomed. Currently conv_grad_ops_3d.cc and conv_ops_3d.cc took 2 hours to compile each on my machine (2 Core + 4GB RAM + HDD). I have to try to avoid making changes to common header files to avoid recompiling these two files...

body: Any improvement on this is welcomed. Currently `conv_grad_ops_3d.cc` and `conv_ops_3d.cc` took 2 hours to compile each on my machine (2 Core + 4GB RAM + HDD). I have to try to avoid making changes to common header files to avoid recompiling these two files...
